textContent: The job loss will not be an overnight wholesale firing of employees and replacing them with AI at existing companies. Instead, what will replace jobs is new companies operating at higher margins without nearly as much labor cost involved. The evidence for this is the Chinese automobile makers and Amazon's ambitions for a fully AI driven company. This will drive the long term job loss as new companies create fewer and fewer jobs
